channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-13216] Add version info in RPC connection header
item.description:
In the operation of a cluster, we usually want to know which clients are using the HBase client with critical bugs or too old version we will not support in future.

By adding version info in RPC connection header, we can get these informations from audit log and promote them upgrade before a deadline.

Discussions and suggestions are welcomed. Thanks.
item.summary: Add version info in RPC connection header

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Patch for master
Please review at https://reviews.apache.org/r/31973/, thanks

This looks good to me. +1 Adding this info should just work even when going against old server? Have you tried it Liu Shaohui? Only comment is you have setVersioInfo.... should it be setVersionInfo? (You have this down in the pb definition).

Fix the typo. Thanks for stack's review.

Tested in standalone mode.

stack
Tested the patch in following cases and it works fine.

  • Old client against new server
  • New client against old server
  • New client against new server
Update the log when there is no version info in connection header

+1

This should go into branch-1 too (i.e. 1.1.0) right Liu Shaohui especially as it works against old servers?

I'd say let it hang out a day or so to see if anymore reviews and if none, just go commit. Nice contrib.

-1 overall. Here are the results of testing the latest attachment
http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12704082/HBASE-13216-v1.diff
against master branch at commit ff8840acc3d3f258c933c91b275922d6528b6893.
ATTACHMENT ID: 12704082

+1 @author. The patch does not contain any @author tags.

-1 tests included. The patch doesn't appear to include any new or modified tests.
Please justify why no new tests are needed for this patch.
Also please list what manual steps were performed to verify this patch.

+1 hadoop versions. The patch compiles with all supported hadoop versions (2.4.1 2.5.2 2.6.0)

+1 javac. The applied patch does not increase the total number of javac compiler warnings.

+1 javac. The applied patch does not increase the total number of javac compiler warnings.

+1 javadoc. The javadoc tool did not generate any warning messages.

-1 checkstyle. The applied patch generated 1919 checkstyle errors (more than the master's current 1917 errors).

+1 findbugs. The patch does not introduce any new Findbugs (version 2.0.3) warnings.

+1 release audit. The applied patch does not increase the total number of release audit warnings.

-1 lineLengths. The patch introduces the following lines longer than 100:
+ " \002(\t\022\014\n\004user\030\004 \002(\t\022\014\n\004date\030\005 \002(\t\022\024\n\014src_" +
+ "\t\022\014\n\004port\030\004 \001(\005\022\024\n\014do_not_retry\030\005 \001(\010\"\246\001" +
+ new java.lang.String[]

{ "Version", "Url", "Revision", "User", "Date", "SrcChecksum", }

);
+ new java.lang.String[]

{ "UserInfo", "ServiceName", "CellBlockCodecClass", "CellBlockCompressorClass", "VersioInfo", }

);

+1 site. The mvn site goal succeeds with this patch.

-1 core tests. The patch failed these unit tests:
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util.TestProcessBasedCluster
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mapreduce.TestImportExport

This looks fine for 0.98 too, I can cherry pick it back when/if it goes in to branch-1
Liu Shaohui You saw the +1s and question above? You going to commit?

stack
Ok, i'll commit it tomorrow if no objection.

SUCCESS: Integrated in HBase-TRUNK #6276 (See https://builds.apache.org/job/HBase-TRUNK/6276/)
HBASE-13216 Add version info in RPC connection header (Shaohui Liu) (liushaohui: rev 602e11cc74b5a0442a754d96bbbcd17fdd171931)

Let me backport this to branch-1. I tried both combinations of old client to new server and new client to old server and all worked fine as expected.
Pushed to branch-1 too.
What I applied to branch-1

SUCCESS: Integrated in HBase-1.1 #354 (See https://builds.apache.org/job/HBase-1.1/354/)
HBASE-13216 Add version info in RPC connection header (Liu Shaohui) (stack: rev 7e1e5a60fbe5ace0ab5c71899268a6553e7d38aa)

  • hbase-client/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/protobuf/ProtobufUtil.java
  • hbase-server/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/ipc/RpcServer.java

  • hbase-protocol/src/main/protobuf/RPC.proto
  • hbase-protocol/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/protobuf/generated/RPCProtos.java
  • hbase-client/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/ipc/RpcClientImpl.java

I picked this back to 0.98 too. It's a safe compatible change. Useful as described for identifying remaining versions that need update in a staged/partial upgrade. While doing this I noticed we are not calculating a source checksum in 0.98 for the version annotation. The annotation is marked private and it's user, VersionInfo, is marked evolving, so I've added this to 0.98 as well.
